thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com
thread.title: Edward Simo
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Edward Simo

author: Edward Simo
title: Edward Simo
text: I've only had the system up and running for about 2 weeks, but so far so good. Installation was fairly easy if you have some experience. The only issue was that the valve for the carbon canister was not tight from the factory. And I would strongly recommend the when you plumb the system you design it so that you can completely bypass the filter for maintenance.
